articles.author: Vikas Yadav
articles.title: Redmi Note 13 Price European Price Of Upcoming Midrange Smartphone Leaks Ahead Of Global Launch; Check Specifications, Launch Date - Jagran English
articles.description: Redmi Note 13 Global Price Leaks: Days ahead of release, the European pricing of the vanilla trim has leaked online. The listing on Aldi Talk suggested that the phone may sit in the sub 229 Euros to 300 Euros bracket.
articles.content: Redmi Note 13 Price: Soon after Xiaomi announced the Redmi Note 13 series with Redmi Note 13, Note 13 Pro and Note 13 Pro Plus in India, the company is all set to launch the lineup in the global mark… [+1917 chars]
